configOptions.name: sections
configOptions.description: Configuration for a section to display on the patient registration screen. Format: list of { id, label, questions: [ { legend, fields:[] } ] }

configOptions.name: afterCreatedActions
configOptions.description: A list of 'bean:beanId' or 'class:fully.qualified.ClassName' that implement org.openmrs.module.registrationapp.action.AfterPatientCreatedAction and will be executed after creating the patient

configOptions.name: afterCreatedUrl
configOptions.description: What url to go to after successfully registering the patient. Supports {{patientId}}

configOptions.name: registrationEncounter
configOptions.description: Config object with uuid of encounter type and encounter role (optional--if not specified, no registration encounter created)

configOptions.name: allowRetrospectiveEntry
configOptions.description: True/false whether or not to allow the registration encounter datetime to be backdated. Shows a datepicker for the registration encounter if encounter is configured, otherwise does nothing.

configOptions.name: allowUnknownPatients
configOptions.description: True/false whether or not to allow the user to create an unknown patient, with no name or age (e.g. arriving unconscious to the ER)

configOptions.name: allowManualIdentifier
configOptions.description: True/false whether or not to allow the user to manually specify the primary identifier (instead of auto-generating it)
